statements: UPDATE CurriculumData SET program_name = 'Computer Science', program_description = 'Study of computers and computing principles' WHERE program_id = 1;
UPDATE CurriculumData SET program_description = 'Learn all about programming' , program_name = 'Software Engineering' WHERE program_id = 2;
UPDATE CurriculumData SET program_name = 'Bachelor of Science' WHERE program_id = 1;
UPDATE CurriculumData SET program_description = 'Advanced program for research in Science' WHERE program_id = 2;
UPDATE curriculum_courses SET course_credit_hours = 4 WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE campus_locations SET campus_city = 'Los Angeles', campus_country = 'USA' WHERE campus_id = 1;
UPDATE curriculum_courses SET course_credit_hours = 4, course_description = 'Updated description' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE campus_locations SET campus_country = 'USA', campus_address = 'Updated address' WHERE campus_id = 1;
UPDATE curriculum_data SET campus_name = 'Main Campus', program_name = 'Computer Science' WHERE program_id = 1;
UPDATE student_data SET student_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE student_id = 3;
UPDATE curriculum_data SET program_name='Computer Science' WHERE program_id=1;
UPDATE student_data SET student_email='jdoe@example.com', course_id=3 WHERE student_id=101;
UPDATE curriculum_program SET program_description = 'New description for program 1', program_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE program_id = 1;
UPDATE campus SET campus_capacity = 500, campus_location = 'New Location' WHERE campus_id = 2;

UPDATE curriculum_program SET program_name='Bachelor of Science in Computer Science', program_description='A comprehensive program on computer science', program_start_date='2023-01-01', program_end_date='2027-01-01' WHERE program_id=1;
UPDATE campus SET campus_capacity=500, campus_location='Los Angeles, CA' WHERE campus_id=2;
UPDATE curriculum_programs SET program_description = 'New Description' WHERE program_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE teachers SET teacher_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE teacher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE curriculum_programs SET program_name = 'Bachelor of Science in Computer Science', campus_location = 'Main Campus' WHERE program_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE teachers SET teacher_name = 'John Doe', teacher_email = 'johndoe@email.com', campus_location = 'Downtown Campus' WHERE teacher_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
